mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commu_free(cm_no, cm_nick, cm_title, cm_content, cm_likeit, cm_rdate) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(cm_no), 0)+1 as cm_no FROM commu_free), #{cm_nick}, #{cm_title}, #{cm_content}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM commu_free
WHERE cm_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE cm_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
WHERE cm_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR cm_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT cm_no, cm_nick, cm_title, cm_content, cm_likeit, cm_rdate, r FROM( SELECT cm_no, cm_nick, cm_title, cm_content, cm_likeit, cm_rdate, rownum as r FROM( SELECT cm_no, cm_nick, cm_title, cm_content, cm_likeit, cm_rdate FROM commu_free
where cm_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where cm_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where cm_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR cm_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY cm_no DESC ) ) WHERE r >=#{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}
